text: Ichkabal is a Mayan ruin in Quintana Roo, Mexico. It was discovered in 1995 by the Spanish archaeologist Enrique Nalda Hern√°ndez. The site's construction dates to the late Preclassic, though it appears to have been inhabited until around AD 1500. Ichkabal is about . On the site are buildings that are more than . Some of the buildings are pyramids. The site opened to tourists in September 2024. ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in Mexico
title: Ichkabal
